A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Awful. I kept clear of all news for days but read reviews in preparation for the last jedi. This is quite possibly one of the worst films I've seen for a long time! What is the plot? Why are the laughs so forced? Do I care about any of the characters? Bad from start to end\, feels like the franchise is prepping for the next gen of kids and toys. Everything great about SW is now gone. Adam Driver's performance is the only thing stopping me from giving this half a star. He's fantastic!
